name: greediness
content:

the quality of wanting a lot more food, money, etc. than you need: My family can't understand why I might need to eat more, and tell me it's greediness. The smugglers are fuelled by greediness. See
greedy
More examplesFewer examplesShe quickly became known for her greediness and insensitivity to the beggars who came seeking help.People used to eat together in groups. It was a shame and a sign of greediness to eat alone.His appetites were strong to the point of greediness.
